meanings.definition: Present or existing from the beginning; first or earliest.
meanings.sent1: The story had an original plot that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent2: Her painting was truly original and stood out among the rest.
meanings.sent3: The original idea to have a picnic in the rain turned out to be quite fun.
meanings.sent4: His original thinking opened up new possibilities for the project.
meanings.sent5: The original melody of the song lingered in my mind long after it ended.

meanings.definition: Not a copy; unique or new.
meanings.sent1: The designer showcased her original dress collection at the fashion show.
meanings.sent2: The artist's style was so original that it couldn't be replicated.
meanings.sent3: It was original of him to wear sunglasses at night for no reason.
meanings.sent4: Her original approach to problem-solving impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The original flavor of the dish left a lasting impression on the diners.

meanings.definition: A work created firsthand by an artist or author.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed an original Picasso painting.
meanings.sent2: She cherished the original manuscript of her favorite book.
meanings.sent3: The original of the famous painting was found in an unexpected place.
meanings.sent4: The author's original fetched a high price at the auction.
meanings.sent5: Owning an original by that artist was a dream come true for the collector.
